description: Have you ever wondered what makes your significant other tick? Why you’re attracted to the people you are? How to best nurture a relationship? Or how to get through a breakup? Dive deeper into the science of relationships with social psychology expert and CSU faculty member, Jennifer Harman, Ph.D., during this free online course, popularly known as a MOOC (massive open online course). The noncredit, social-based program is designed for individuals interested in the field of psychology and those who want to gain a deeper understanding of the science behind how relationships work.
title: Science of Relationships
